text: Epithemavon Blume CL (1826) Bijdr. Fl. Ned. Ind. 14: 737. is a genus of plants in the family Gesneriaceae and tribe Klugieae. Species distribution records are mostly from western tropical Africa to Uganda, tropical and subtropical Asia. ==Species== Epithema sarawakense flower The Catalogue of Life lists: * Epithema benthamii * Epithema brunonis * Epithema calcicola * Epithema carnosum * Epithema dentatum * Epithema difforme * Epithema dolichopodum * Epithema horsfieldii * Epithema involucratum * Epithema longipetiolatum * Epithema longitubum * Epithema madulidii * Epithema membranaceum * Epithema parvibracteatum * Epithema rennellense * Epithema sarawakense * Epithema saxatile * Epithema steenisii * Epithema strigosum * Epithema taiwanense * Epithema tenerum * Epithema tenue * Epithema zeylanicum == References == == External links== * Category:Flora of Africa Category:Flora of Asia Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Gesneriaceae genera Category:Gesneriaceae
title: Epithema
